snippet: HERING--Barbara Gordon, age 92, died in Washington DC on May 19, 2016. Barbara is survived by her loving husband of 59 years Louis Hering, children Janet G. Hering, James G. Hering and Louis G. Hering, daughter-in-law Lisa Gannon and granddaughters Phoebe and Eliza. Her strength of character, kindness and intelligence will be missed by all who knew her. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HERING--Barbara Gordon, age 92, died in Washington DC on May 19, 2016. Barbara is survived by her loving husband of 59 years Louis Hering, children Janet G. Hering, James G. Hering and Louis G. Hering, daughter-in-law Lisa Gannon and granddaughters Phoebe and Eliza. Her strength of character, kindness and intelligence will be missed by all who knew her. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HERING, BARBARA GORDON
